description:
The Next-Gen Collaboration Suite

Lark is a next-generation office suite that integrates messaging, schedule management, collaborative documents, video conferencing, and many more applications in a single platform.
Base
- You can set editor, viewer, and administrator roles in advanced permissions for more effective division and assignment of tasks.
- You can also set Only Custom Roles Can Access in advanced permissions to only allow specified custom roles to access the base. Other users with the base link or added through the sharing panel will have no access.
